value.name: Trial ordered for ex-narcotics officer on 2 new drug charges
value.description: Nicholas Lister, a former confidential informant for multiple police agencies, testified Tuesday of two purchases of Oxycontin that he said Johnson had him make in June and August 2014.

value.name: Man shot, killed by police in Millcreek
value.description: MILLCREEK, Utah (AP) — A 31-year-old man died after being shot by police in the Salt Lake City suburb of Millcreek. Salt Lake County Sheriff Jim Winder says Nicholas Lister was shot Friday night ...
